blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Its funny how some people want dnp to come out because if they do either saying “we’re just friends” or “yeah we’re dating” its...
question: Its funny how some people want dnp to come out because if they do either saying “we’re just friends” or “yeah we’re dating” its going to be the end of dnp. Yeah there might be a “omg they’re actually dating” (if they come out) but thats going to happen for a month at most and everyone is going to be in a “well what now” state and everyone is going to leave. I dont want to imagine the backlash if they “come out” as friends. There’s a reason that they haven’t said anything about phan for 10 years.
answer: Yeah they’ll never come out as anything. There’s a reason they keep it so blurry.

reblog.comment: Yeah they’ll never come out as anything. There’s a reason they keep it so blurry.

trail.content_raw: Yeah they’ll never come out as anything. There’s a reason they keep it so blurry.
trail.content: Yeah they’ll never come out as anything. There’s a reason they keep it so blurry.

summary: I'm laughing. All this talk about them merging into danandphil™️ while their individual selves are disappearing into the void...
question: I'm laughing. All this talk about them merging into danandphil™️ while their individual selves are disappearing into the void and now their fucking individual shops become one. So. Fucking. Ironic.
answer:
“But it’s temporary, for the holiday season!”


My psychic sense are telling me that’s a lie. They’ll keep it after Christmas. It’ll just be the danandphilshop, but with a “Dan” tab and a “Phil” tab. (Which actually kind of does make some sense I won’t lie)

reblog.comment:

trail.content_raw:

My psychic sense are telling me that’s a lie. They’ll keep it after Christmas. It’ll just be the danandphilshop, but with a “Dan” tab and a “Phil” tab. (Which actually kind of does make some sense I won’t lie)
